NoteNinja

A personal project I did some time back to learn React. The app lets you maintain a list of notes which are fully encrypted and are only ever decrypted on the client side.

Source

eXPLOREpLACES Website

Design & development of the eXPLOREpLACES website. The website transcodes and stores the videos in a format suitable for HLS streaming. Also provides an admin panel to manage the videos, users, advertisements and comments.

View Website

CloudCone WHMCS Module

Development of the CloudCone WHMCS module. This is a plug-in for WHMCS which allows CloudCone customers to resell servers through their own WHMCS website.
